sentences.sentence: Recall that Bitcoin nodes can be divided into broadly two classes, verifiers and clients.
sentences.translation: 回想一下，比特币节点大致可以分为两类：验证人和客户。

sentences.sentence: Recall that Bitcoin nodes can be divided into broadly two classes, verifiers and clients.
sentences.translation: 回想一下，比特币节点大致可以分为两类：审核员和客户。

sentences.sentence: In the next section we will explain how this prevents Verifiers from replaying presented U-Prove tokens.
sentences.translation: 在下一节中，我们会说明这是如何防止校验方重放已经存在的U - Prove令牌的。
